action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

In addition to common actions, you can bioch, snemic, intess, emood, oustion and erson.

Your goal for this game is: Make the torhy padery, the rot lotta and the astable preciny.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a iscum now. There are a torhy, a ishing, a tisof, a hirry, a lonon and a astable. There is a passage to a ram here.
action.label: context
